data.title: Heath Ledger
data.meta_description: Get the latest heath ledger news, articles, videos and photos on Page Six.
data.text:
Robert Irwin and girlfriend Rorie Buckey split after 2 years of dating: 'We wish one another all the very best'

"We wish to express the gratitude and respect we have for one another as we continue our journeys on different paths," the pair announced via Instagram.

Penthouse in Heath Ledger death building sells for record $49M

The massive loft-like home is in a 19th-century cast-iron building where the late actor Heath Ledger tragically overdosed back in 2008.

'Joker 2' is happening — but it's already a 'hard pass' for some DC fans

Resurrecting the twisted tale of the grinning green-haired supervillain, the director of the original “Joker,” Todd Phillips, is set co-write the Academy Award-winning film’s sequel.

Heath Ledger refused to present at Oscars over 'Brokeback Mountain' jokes

Jake Gyllenhaal claims his co-star was adamant that the homosexual relationship depicted in 2005's "Brokeback Mountain" be taken seriously.

Joaquin Phoenix acknowledges Heath Ledger as he wins at SAG Awards 2020

Ledger died of an accidental drug overdose in 2008. He was 28 years old.

Michelle Williams reportedly pregnant, engaged to 'Hamilton' director Thomas Kail

Michelle Williams is reportedly engaged to the Tony Award-winning director of "Hamilton" — and the two are expecting a child.

How you can buy Heath Ledger's iconic 'Brokeback Mountain' jeans

I wish I knew how to fit you!

Andrew Keegan talks '10 Things I Hate About You,' Heath Ledger friendship 20 years later

"We were all just kids making a film, not ever really having any idea how significant this film would be," Keegan said.

Heath Ledger's dad comments on Michelle Williams' secret marriage

Williams and Heath Ledger dated for several years and welcomed a daughter together before his sudden death in 2008.

Michelle Williams: Raising Matilda without Heath 'won't ever be right'

"This is not what I imagined," she said.

Heath Ledger's NYC apartment was a shrine to the Joker

Police investigators who responded to the Oscar-winning actor's Soho loft after his fatal 2008 drug overdose walked into a world filled with Batman comic books.

Heath Ledger's death still affects Jake Gyllenhaal

"It affected me in ways I can't necessarily put in words," Gyllenhaal said of his "Brokeback Mountain" co-star's accidental overdose in 2008.
